metadata.title: CVE-2023-49006 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Phpsysinfo version 3.4.3allows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information via a crafted pagein the XML.php file.

criterions.comment: phpsysinfo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
